chapter.title: Block Storage
chapter.para: The OpenStack Block Storage Service works with many different storage drivers that you can configure by using these instructions.

section.title: cinder.conf configuration file
section.para: The cinder.conf file is installed in /etc/cinder by default. When you manually install the Block Storage Service, the options in the cinder.conf file are set to default values.
